lines.text:
[after escaping the cannibals for the first time]
Well, it sure was an intresting way to start off a weekend.
Yeah, and I hope it doesn't get any more intresting.

[to Carrie]
Hey baby! You suck my cock and I'll lick your pussy!

[the cannibals have Amy hostage]
Hey, what do you think you're doing?
Shut the fuck up, smart ass, or the bitch gets it!
Hey! You're not so S-M-A-R-T, are ya? You heard what he said? He said 'Shut the fuck up!' One more word out of you and the bitch gets her throat cut!
